```{r packages}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)

fin <- path_source("00-rawdata", "virome-RA.xlsx")

df_patient2sample <- openxlsx::read.xlsx(fin, sheet = "Group-1") %>% 
  setnames(colnames(.), c("sample_id", "project_id", "with_gvhd", "no_gvhd")) %>% 
  mutate(patient_id = str_replace_all(project_id, "-[0-9]+$", "")) %>% 
  dplyr::select(c("sample_id", "patient_id"))

df_relab_patient <- openxlsx::read.xlsx(fin, sheet = "GVHD") %>% 
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(contig_id)) %>% 
  column_to_rownames("contig_id") %>% 
  t() %>% 
  data.frame() %>% 
  rownames_to_column("sample_id") %>% 
  dplyr::left_join(df_patient2sample, by = "sample_id") %>% 
  dplyr::select(-"sample_id") %>% 
  group_by(patient_id) %>%
  summarise_all(sum) %>%
  column_to_rownames("patient_id") %>% 
  t() %>% 
  data.frame() %>% 
  rownames_to_column("feature_id") %>% 
  mutate(feature_id = str_replace(feature_id, "vout.", "votu_"))
  
openxlsx::write.xlsx(df_relab_patient, path_target("virome_RA_mergeby_patient.xlsx"))
```
